channel.title: Blog on Eugenio Cano-Manuel Mendoza
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Eugenio Cano-Manuel Mendoza

item.title: Playing with SQLite to optimise my electricity usage
item.description: I’m in the process of switching to Agile Octopus, an electricity tariff that ties the price I pay with the wholesale price, updated every 30 minutes. The reason I’ve been looking forward to switching to a tariff as dynamic as this one is to restrict my electric boiler to only run during the cheapest times of the day. My boiler is a direct unvented cylinder. In Layman’s terms this is a big cyclinder that heats and stores water.

item.title: List of favorite articles and blogs from the web
item.description: This is a living document! It’s a list of interesting articles and blog posts I’ve found on the web. Will keep updated. Simple Systems Have Less Downtime John Carmack on Inlined Code The Absolute Minimum Every Software Developer Absolutely, Positively Must Know About Unicode and Character Sets (No Excuses!) Jane Street Core “Notes on Time” Software disenchantment Simple Made Easy Suckless Philosophy The Majestic Monolith
